textBeforeTable: Track Listing New York's signature up-all-night energy courses through this album of angular, compressed rock and roll, but there's a sweet melancholy that toes the line between music that sweeps the listener up, and lyrics that beg for their deep sensitivity and understanding. 03/31/2014 Amoeba Review Buy $9.99 Comments: Sticker residue on UPC Light wear to digipak Media Condition: Very Good CD Price Format Condition 1 Used Vinyl LP 1 used from $9.99 SHIPS FREE in U.S. BUY Drowners Drowners (CD) [Explicit] Also available in: $13.98
